This is a variable-level spell. Which level(s) would you like to add to your sheet?

Once you've added all the bonuses, click 'Add Mods'. Effects of the mods will not show on your sheet until you finish the wizard.

This section stores all the basic information on your character. Most of these fields have no effect on the sheet itself, but there are two that do: Class/Level: is filled by the sheet as you enter your class(es) and level(s) in the class tab. Race HP: This is used by the sheet to calculate your hp and stores your racial starting hp.
?
This section stores all the basic information on your class(es). The fields are organized into the following columns: Name: The name of the class. This is concatenated with level to create the class/level field in the character details screen. Level: The level of this class. In addition to affecting the class/level field, this is used to calculate much of your character's info from health to skills Stamina Points: How many stamina points the class grants at each level. Hit Points: How many hit points the class grants at each level. Base Attack Bonus Progression: The progression of the class' BAB. 1/2 BAB classes will have a bab of 0 at level 1 and 10 at level 20. 3/4 BAB classes will have a bab of 0 at level 1 and 15 at level 20. Full BAB (or 1) will have a BAB equal to their level. Fortitude/Reflex/Will Save Progressions: The progression of the saves. There are two progressions: Good, which starts at 2, and Poor which starts at 0. Skills/Level: The number of skill points your class grants each level, not counting intelligence bonus Key Ability: The class' key ability score Spells Checkbox: Checked if the class casts spells
?
This section stores the details of all your spellcasting classes. A panel is created for each class that casts spells, and each panel has the following editable fields: Casting Ability: The ability used to cast spells. Spell Progression: How quickly the class gains new spell levels. Technomancer and Mystic are partial spell casters. Other progressions are included to support importing pathfinder classes. Spells/Day: There is a current and a maximum for each spell level. These are displayed as different spell levels are gained.
?
